summary: This is an email chain between FBI agents and NYPD detectives from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force, coordinating to serve a subpoena on a witness in the Epstein case and to obtain the criminal history of a female associate of that witness. The communications detail investigative steps, including address verification and record checks.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: NYPD detective embedded with the FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force, requesting assistance in serving a subpoena and obtaining criminal history records.

connections.description: FBI Special Agent and NYPD Detective collaborating on serving a subpoena and conducting record checks for the Epstein case investigation.
FBI Special Agent and NYPD Task Force Officer working together on investigative tasks related to the Epstein case.
NYPD Detective and NYPD Task Force Officer are colleagues on the same task force, coordinating on the Epstein case investigation.

events.title: Subpoena Service Connection
events.description: The NYPD detective confirms being in touch with the witness after the FBI agent provided address information, indicating the subpoena service process was underway.

events.title: Criminal History Request
events.description: The NYPD detective requests the FBI's assistance in obtaining the full criminal history of a female associate of a witness, revealing she has multiple felony convictions in Florida.

locations: North Palm PD (North Palm Beach Police Department)
keyFacts: Law enforcement was actively serving a subpoena on a witness for the Epstein case in December 2020.
Investigators sought the criminal history of a female associate (DOB 1981) of a witness, who had felony convictions for cocaine possession and dealing stolen property in Florida.
The investigative team included embedded NYPD detectives and FBI agents from the Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.
Communication shows coordination between the FBI's New York and Miami/Palm Beach offices on Epstein case matters.
